Functions
00400_mcFreeWsm
Normal_Client_API

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_DeviceDefault () 1)
 
 TestCase_BC00101_DeviceInvalid () 1)
 
 TestCase_BC00102_WsmNullPointer () 1)
 
 TestCase_BC00103_MemoryNotManagedByLib () 1)
 

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection Generic preconditions (setup)
      Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. They are executed always in front of every single test case.
  • open device using the default ID by calling mcOpenDevice()
  • allocate a WSM buffer (4k)

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • close session to the Trusted Application
  • free allocated memory of WSM buffer
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_DeviceDefault ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
mcFreeWsm works correctly.
Test Steps:
  1. TLC allocates a block of WSM.
    1. TLC frees the block again All checks pass, Test output is OK
Manual Execution:
No

Yes

Yes

Yes

TestCase_BC00101_DeviceInvalid ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
mcFreeWsm returns an error for an unknown device id.
Test Steps:
TLC calls mcFreeWsm with an unknown device id (1) mcFreeWsm() returns MC_DRV_ERR_UNKNOWN_DEVICE, Test output is OK

No

TestCase_BC00102_WsmNullPointer ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:

TestCase_BC00103_MemoryNotManagedByLib ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
mcFreeWsm returns an error for a parameter points a memory block that is not controlled by driver.
Test Steps:
TLC calls mcFreeWsm with memory not managed by MobiCore Driver mcFreeWsm() returns MC_DRV_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER, Test output is OK

No
